title: The LaTeX Training Program for ESRC Interns

title: World Engineering Day for Sustainable Development 2025
description: The Electronic Systems Research Center opened its doors for an informative open house as part of the World Engineering Day for Sustainable Development. Students from various courses had the chance to explore the center and engage with the innovative work taking place across different disciplines of engineering.
alt: Engineering Students from various courses exploring and learning about what ESRC is - Electronic Systems Research Center (Batangas State University The NEU)

title: STM32 Hackathon 2025
description: As part of the celebration for the World Engineering Dayˏ spearheaded by the Electronic Systems Research Center (ESRC)ˏ Center for Innovation in Engineering Education (CIEE)ˏ Future Electronicsˏ and STMicroelectronics Inc.ˏ students from various fields tested their wits in the STM32 Hackathon. Despite the heated battle of logic and mindsˏ only Team Awts Gege remained standing and became the STM32 Hackathon Champion
alt: Students from various fields and campus gathered to test their wits in creating innovative solutions using the new STM32 Processor - Electronic Systems Research Center (Batangas State University The NEU)

title: MSU GenSan - ICE Box Benchmarking
description: We had the pleasure of welcoming the 𝐌𝐒𝐔 𝐆𝐞𝐧𝐒𝐚𝐧 - 𝐈𝐂𝐄 𝐁𝐎𝐗 at the 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐢𝐜 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐜𝐡 𝐂𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫 (ESRC) guided 𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐫. 𝐂𝐀𝐑𝐋𝐎𝐒 𝐉𝐇𝐀𝐘 𝐀. 𝐀𝐑𝐑𝐎𝐘𝐎 shared insightful discussions on our projects and highlight the center's capabilities.
alt: Engr.Carlos Jhay Arroyo shared insightful discussions on ESRC projects.

title: Mindoro State University - iBIBES Benchmarking
description: Guided by 𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐫. 𝐂𝐀𝐑𝐋𝐎𝐒 𝐉𝐇𝐀𝐘 𝐀. 𝐀𝐑𝐑𝐎𝐘𝐎 they dived into what ESRC is and it's innovative projects aimed at solving real-world problems.
alt: they dived into what ESRC is and it's innovative projects aimed at solving real-world problems.

title: SPAMAST - Benchmarking
description: ESRC shared insights into center's capabilities and ongoing projects to the visitors from the 𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐧 𝐏𝐡𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐩𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬 𝐀𝐠𝐫𝐢-𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐀𝐪𝐮𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐒𝐜𝐡𝐨𝐨𝐥 𝐨𝐟 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐲 (𝐒𝐏𝐀𝐌𝐀𝐒𝐓).
alt: 𝐃𝐫. 𝐑𝐚𝐥𝐩𝐡 𝐆𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐫𝐝 𝐁. 𝐒𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐚𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐠 our Center Head along with𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐫. 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐥𝐨𝐬 𝐉𝐡𝐚𝐲 𝐀. 𝐀𝐫𝐫𝐨𝐲𝐨 shared insights into ESRC's capabilities and ongoing projects of the center.

title: Lycan Motorcycle Inc. - Benchmarking
description: The CEO of 𝐋𝐲𝐜𝐚𝐧 𝐌𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐜𝐲𝐜𝐥𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐜. 𝐌𝐫. 𝐉𝐨𝐡𝐧 𝐀𝐧𝐝𝐫𝐞𝐰 𝐂 𝐆𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐚t visited 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐢𝐜 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐜𝐡 𝐂𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫 (𝐄𝐒𝐑𝐂).
alt: This visit provided an excellent opportunity to showcase our center’s commitment to advancing research and innovation in electronic systems.

title: Secretary Kiko Benitez visited ESRC
description: We were honored to be visited our distinguished guests 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐲 𝐉𝐨𝐬𝐞 𝐅𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨 '𝐊𝐢𝐤𝐨' 𝐁. 𝐁𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐳 Director General of the Technical Education and Skills Development Authority led by Assoc. Prof. Albertson D. Amante Vice President for Research Development and Extension Services and Director of STEER Hub and Dr. Tirso A. Ronquillo President of the Batangas State University The NEU.
alt: This visit served as a great opportunity to highlight ESRC’s dedication to fostering excellence in technical education and skills development through its projects and services.

title: Don Bosco Technical College - Benchmarking
description: We were honored to welcome our guests from 𝐃𝐨𝐧 𝐁𝐨𝐬𝐜𝐨 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐂𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐞 to the 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐢𝐜 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐜𝐡 𝐂𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫 (𝐄𝐒𝐑𝐂). Their visit was a meaningful opportunity to exchange ideas and share our projects.
alt: We appreciate the time and effort of our guests and look forward to exploring future opportunities.

title: OmniFab and Collins Aerospace - Benchmarking
description: "𝐎𝐦𝐧𝐢𝐟𝐚𝐛 𝐈𝐧𝐜. and Collins Aerospace recently visited the Electronics Systems Research Center (ESRC) for a benchmarking activity led by 𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐫. 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐥𝐨𝐬 𝐉𝐡𝐚𝐲 𝐀. 𝐀𝐫𝐫𝐨𝐲𝐨. The visit highlighted innovative practices
img2: and potential collaborations in the field of electronics and semiconductor technology."
